name: Free Keylogger Report
summary: An FKR file is a report created by IwantSoft FKL, a Windows keylogger and activity monitoring application. It contains a log of the actions a user performed on their computer during a monitored timeframe. For example, an FKR file lists the applications a user opened, the keys they pressed, and the websites they visited.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
